div.p: This code system https://open-health-manager.github.io/standard-patient-health-record-ig/CodeSystem/apple-health-kit-workout-event-type-code-system defines the following codes:

tr.td: A constant indicating that the workout has paused.
A constant indicating that the workout has resumed.
A constant indicating that the system has automatically paused a workout session.
A constant indicating that the system has automatically resumed a workout session.
A constant indicating that the user has requested a pause or resume.
A constant indicating a period of time of interest during a workout.
A constant indicating a point of interest during a workout session.

title.value: Apple HealthKit Workout Event Type Code System

description.value: Code System required for defining workout event type ValueSet

display.value: A constant indicating that the workout has paused.
A constant indicating that the workout has resumed.
A constant indicating that the system has automatically paused a workout session.
A constant indicating that the system has automatically resumed a workout session.
A constant indicating that the user has requested a pause or resume.
A constant indicating a period of time of interest during a workout.
A constant indicating a point of interest during a workout session.
